text: "This Used to Be My Playground" is a soft rock ballad from American singer Madonna. The song is about memories of childhood dreams. The song was featured in the credits of the movie A League of Their Own in 1992. It is, however, not on the soundtrack album. The song spent one week at #1 on Billboard Hot 100 in summer 1992. The longest version of the song is just over six minutes in length. Category:1992 songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:Madonna songs
title: This Used to Be My Playground
